body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Harris Motors. My name is Thomas Harris. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Deborah. Can you please provide me with your date of birth in format day month year?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's two five zero four one nine eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And may I have the first line of your address along with the postal code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The first line is one two three Main Street and the postal code is A B C one two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the information, Deborah. I will look into the matter related to your recent car return. Is there anything else you would like to add before I proceed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Deborah. Thank you for your time and feel free to reach out if you need any further assistance. Have a great day!
